attributes.action: Call for a European ban on the human consumption of horse meat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the great suffering of horses in transportation for slaughter in Europe is barbric as they arrive often blinded, injured and exhausted. We ask the Prime Minister to call for a ban on the human consumption of horse meat in Europe, believing it to be unnecessary and unethical.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
